text: :  . ,  . The Role. Provide administrative support in payments to our suppliers. Prepare payment orders and further upload to the IPOS system. Follow the complete process of paying suppliers invoices. Collect all invoices/Akt of acceptance (signing, stamping). To be in touch with suppliers on payments procedures. Requirements. Fresh graduate (high education). Desire to learn. Strong time management. Organisational skills. Good communication skills. English  intermediate and above. Time management. Administrative Support.

{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::6144c4873da58f0d52e8a2f2::headhunter_kz", "source": "headhunter_kz", "country": "KZ", "company": "PricewaterhouseCoopers", "position": "Intern to Administrative department", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: не требуется

Полная занятость, полный день

The Role

  • Provide administrative support in payments to our suppliers
  • Prepare payment orders and further upload to the IPOS system
  • Follow the complete process of paying suppliers’ invoices
  • Collect all invoices/Akt of acceptance (signing, stamping)
  • To be in touch with suppliers on payments procedures

Requirements

  • Fresh graduate (high education)
  • Desire to learn
  • Strong time management
  • Organisational skills
  • Good communication skills
  • English – intermediate and above

Ключевые навыки

Английский язык
Time management
Administrative Support
"}
